===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[meet]]; to [[see]]
#: {{zh-x|我們 '''見''' 個 '''面''' 吧。|Let's '''meet''' up.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 現在 就 在 你 告訴 我 的 見面 地點。|I am here now where you told me to '''meet''' you.}}

====Usage notes====
* As demonstrated in the example sentence above, the word {{zh-l|見面}} can also be split up into a verb {{zh-l|見}} and an object {{zh-l|面}}.
